title: Documents as user interfaces
proctitle: CHI '91: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Eric A. Bier
authors.institution: Xerox Palo Alto Research Center, 3333 Coyote Hill Rd., Palo Alto, CA

authors.name: Ken Pier
authors.institution: Xerox Palo Alto Research Center, 3333 Coyote Hill Rd., Palo Alto, CA

references.text: Beach, R. J. Setting Tables and Illustrations with Style. Ph. D, thesis, U. of Waterloo, Canada. Also Xerox PARC Technical Report CSL-85-3.

Bier, E. A. and Goodisman, A. Documents as user interfaces. In R. Furuta (ed). EP90, Proceedings of the International Conference on Electronic Publishing. Document Manipulation and Typography. Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, 1990, pp 249-262.

Pier, K., Bier, E. A. and Stone, M. An introduction to Gargoyle: An interactive illustration tool. In J.C. van Vliet (ed). EP88, Proceedings of the International Conference on Document Manipulation and Typography, Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, 1988, pp. 223-238. Also in Xerox PARC Technical Report EDL-89-1.

Swinehart, D. C., Zellweger, P. T., Beach, R. J., Hagmann, R. B. A structural view of the Cedar programming environment. ACM Transactions on Programming Languages and Systems 8~ 4 (Oct. 1986), pp. 419-490. Also Xerox PARC Technical Report CSL-86-1.
